name: QuickBooks 2017 for Mac Data File
summary: A QB2017 file is a data file created by the 2017 version of QuickBooks for Mac, a financial management application. It contains financial data for a company, which includes employee profiles, payroll information, and customer data. QB2015 files can be used to generate tax forms, invoices, financial reports, and more.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
